Title: The Secret City of Shambhala #shorts #short
Description: Journey into the myth of Shambhala, a hidden city mentioned in ancient texts. Is it a real place or a spiritual dimension? Explore this enigma in a fascinating short video. #Shambhala #MysticalCities #AncientMysteries #SpiritualDimensions

Scenes.VoiceOverText: The name of this civilization is mentioned in various ancient writings all over the world.
Scenes.Description: Scrolls, manuscripts, and ancient texts with references to a hidden city.
Scenes.Text: The name of this civilization is mentioned in various ancient writings all over the world.
